name: LucasUtilities
summary: This module has some utility functions used on the Super App Moeda Digital
description: TODO: This pod has a few useful functions, used in the Moeda Digital Super App. Encode turns a list of strings into a piped string (eg: ["ABC", "DEF", "GHI"] -> "ABC|DEF|GHI") and decode goes the other way around. At last, formatCoins turns a Double into coin format, such as 123456789.123456789 -> "$ 123,456,789.12".
